name: Sensor Dashboard
backend_requirements: 1. Reading model: id, temperature, humidity, timestamp
2. GET /api/sensors/current - return latest reading (or generate random mock data)
3. GET /api/sensors/history?hours=24 - return readings from last N hours
4. POST /api/sensors/reading - accept new reading (for simulated sensor)
frontend_requirements: 1. Large cards displaying current temperature and humidity
3. Simple line chart showing last 24 hours (Chart.js)
4. Color-coded alerts if values outside normal range
